opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Abul-Kabir, Fka Cole v. Dretke, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division

opinion:
543 U.S. 985

ABUL-KABIR, FKA COLE
v.
DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.

No. 04-5876.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 15, 2004.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Tennard v. Dretke, 542 U.S. 274. Reported below: 99 Fed. Appx. 523.
